title: Impact of Your Zakaat During Ramadan
donateMessage: This Ramadan, your Zakaat goes even further. Help relieve suffering, uplift communities, and earn multiplied rewards during this blessed month.

stats.label: Kaswet Aid Provided
stats.note: Delivering essential aid and support through the Kaswet initiative to those in need during Ramadan.

stats.label: Ramadan Iftar Meals
stats.note: Distributing hot, nutritious Iftar meals to help families break their fast with dignity.

stats.label: Food Packages Distributed
stats.note: Providing vital food supplies to struggling households for the entire month of Ramadan.

stats.label: Zakaat Contributions
stats.note: Empowering lives and fulfilling religious duty through your generous Zakaat donations.
